amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore public participation in development of the proposed land exchange by striking language that would subvert proper environmental review under NEPA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 112-660 to restore public participation in development of this proposed land exchange, which is prohibited under H.R. 5544.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 236 (Roll no. 564).
